caarlos0/jvm
djui/alias-tips
# comments are supported like this
caarlos0/zsh-mkc	# tab trailing
				zsh-users/zsh-completions kind:fpath path:src
caarlos0/zsh-open-github-pr    # end of line comment

# empty lines are skipped

	# trailing comments are a thing too

# annotations are also allowed:
ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh path:plugins/aws

# specifying git branches is also permitted
caarlos0/jvm kind:path branch:gh-pages

zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting
zsh-users/zsh-history-substring-search
